Man tho this show is flipping great!


"@NotYourAverageLurker":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54bb2d8d6368724e21230400#post_54bb2d8d6368724e21230400

"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54bb2ddd6368722387aa0100#post_54bb2ddd6368722387aa0100
Its sad cuz the _very_ first season of Johnny Test when it FIRST EVER AIRD on WB was pretty funny.

BUT THEN after the first season they got bought out and Cartoon Network took over and damn I'm even ashamed I even watched the first season of that show cuz it went _*to shit*_.

The writing fail flatter then a flat line at a hospital made out of paper.

The animation got so damn lazy you minds as well not even HAVE animation.

The jokes got over used.

The Characters turned to shit.

And all and all everything about the show was just bad.

I fucking hate Johnny Test, I _*Despise it*_.

"@NotYourAverageLurker":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54bb3066636872555d680400#post_54bb3066636872555d680400
[bq="NotYourAverageLurker"]"@EHAN":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54bb2f9863687248d0940200#post_54bb2f9863687248d0940200
So, EHAN. How many waifus do you have on Pokemon alone, seeing that you've already changed your profile pic?[/bq]
I'll try to list them off the top of my head

+Three definites:+
"Flannery":http://bulbapedia.bulbagarden.net/wiki/Flannery
"Evelyn":http://bulbapedia.bulbagarden.net/wiki/Battle_Chatelaine_Evelyn
"Kirlia":http://bulbapedia.bulbagarden.net/wiki/Kirlia_(Pok%C3%A9mon)

+Depending on my mood, they can count too:+
"May":http://bulbapedia.bulbagarden.net/wiki/May_(game)
"Roxie":http://bulbapedia.bulbagarden.net/wiki/Roxie
"Roxanne":http://bulbapedia.bulbagarden.net/wiki/Roxanne (only if we're talking about the OR/AS Roxanne though)
"Phoebe":http://bulbapedia.bulbagarden.net/wiki/Phoebe (again, only OR/AS)
